page.title: 08Churches,Rutland
page.content: There are three churches in the study area _ St Mary the Virgin , Ayston , St Mary and Andrew , Ridlington , and St Peter St Paul , Preston .These are all described in Pevsner's (1984) "Leicestershire and Rutland" volume of "The Buildings of England" series. Another interesting reference is a Victorian Albumn of watercolours and drawings which describes these churhes as they were in the 1830's. This is published by Barrowden Books London (1983) and there is a copy in the Uppingham School Library.The original paintings and drawings are in the archives of Uppingham School. A bibliography of Leicestershire churches, including newspaper sources, has been published by the Department of Adult Education, University of Leicester (1978, 1980).
